LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_Breakup_Arranged.label: 통제됨
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_Breakup_Arranged.descrip:
People should never break up with their lovers unless it's not allowed by the society.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 기본 이별 확률: 0%
 - 직접 이별 컨트롤 가능.
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_Breakup_Forbidden.label: 금지됨
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_Breakup_Forbidden.descri:
People should never break up with their lovers.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 기본 이별 확률: 0%.
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_Breakup_Discouraged.desc:
People should not break up with their lovers in most cases.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 이별 확률 -50%.
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_Breakup_Encouraged.label: 장려함
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_Breakup_Encouraged.descr:
People should have their right to break up with their lovers freely.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 이별 확률 +50%.
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_Cheat_Forbidden.label: 금지됨
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_Cheat_Forbidden.descript:
People should never cheat on others.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 바람필 확률: 0%.
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_Cheat_Discouraged.label: 억제함
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_Cheat_Discouraged.descri:
We should keep our pledge in most cases.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 바람필 확률 -50%.
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_Cheat_Encouraged.label: 장려함
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_Cheat_Encouraged.descrip:
Love is chaotic and insane. Things will change, I am sorry for that.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 바람필 확률 +50%.
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_MarriageProposal_Arrange:
Marriage can only be decided by the whole society.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 기본 결혼 프로포즈 확률: 0%
 - 직접 결혼 컨트롤 가능.
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_MarriageProposal_Forbidd:
Marriage is the tomb of love.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 기본 결혼 프로포즈 확률: 0%.
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_MarriageProposal_FlashMa:
If that thy bent of love be honourable, thy purpose marriage,send me word tomorrow.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 결혼 프로포즈 확률 +50%.
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_MarriageProposal_LateMar:
I am still waiting for the only soul in the world.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 결혼 프로포즈 확률 -50%.
All romance attempts must be under the control of the whole society.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 기본 연애 시도 확률: 0%
 - 직접 연애시도 컨트롤 가능.
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_RomanceAttempt_Forbidden:
Everyone in our society should keep purely single.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 기본 연애 시도 확률: 0%.
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_RomanceAttempt_Discourag:
Romance on the rim is dead.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 연애 시도 확률 -50%.
LanguageData.RomanceOnTheRim_RomanceAttempt_Encourage:
Love is danger, love is pleasure.
Love is pure, the only treasure.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - 연애 시도 확률 +50%.
